sentence: Avon Products, Inc. ( AVP ) will begin trading ex-dividend on November 12, 2015.
A cash dividend payment of $0.06 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 01, 2015.
Shareholders who purchased AVP prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 13th quarter that AVP has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $3.16, the dividend yield is 7.59%.
The previous trading day's last sale of AVP was $3.16, representing a -70.33% decrease from the 52 week high of $10.65 and a 6.76% increase over the 52 week low of $2.96.
AVP is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
AVP's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is -$2.59.
Zacks Investment Research reports AVP's forecasted earnings growth in 2015 as -80.89%, compared to an industry average of 7.1%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the AVP Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
